akn:content.akn:p: (a) In general After notice and opportunity to submit comment in accordance with section 553(c) of title 5, the Board, jointly with the Director of the Bureau of Consumer Financial Protection, shall prescribe regulations—

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Regulations relating to improvement of check processing system

akn:content.akn:p: (b) Regulations relating to improvement of check processing system In order to improve the check processing system, the Board shall consider (among other proposals) requiring, by regulation, that—

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Regulatory responsibility of Board for payment system

akn:content.akn:p: (c) Regulatory responsibility of Board for payment system

(e) Consultations In prescribing regulations under subsections (a) and (b), the Board and the Director of the Bureau of Consumer Financial Protection, in the case of subsection (a), and the Board, in the case of subsection (b), shall consult with the Comptroller of the Currency, the Board of Directors of the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation, and the National Credit Union Administration Board.
